  41. #ifndef NATIVE_CODE

  43. /* The table of primitives */
  44. ‌struct ext_table caml_prim_table;

  46. #ifdef DEBUG
  47. /* The names of primitives (for instrtrace.c) */
  48. ‌struct ext_table caml_prim_name_table;
  49. #endif

  51. /* The table of shared libraries currently opened */
  52. ‌static struct ext_table shared_libs;

  54. /* The search path for shared libraries */
  55. ‌struct ext_table caml_shared_libs_path;

  57. /* Look up the given primitive name in the built-in primitive table,
  58.    then in the opened shared libraries (shared_libs) */
  59. ‌static c_primitive lookup_primitive(char * name)
  60. {
  61.   int i;
  62.   void * res;

  64.   for (i = 0; caml_names_of_builtin_cprim[i] != NULL; i++) {
  65.     if (strcmp(name, caml_names_of_builtin_cprim[i]) == 0)
  66.       return caml_builtin_cprim[i];
  67.   }
  68.   for (i = 0; i < shared_libs.size; i++) {
  69.     res = caml_dlsym(shared_libs.contents[i], name);
  70.     if (res != NULL) return (c_primitive) res;
  71.   }
  72.   return NULL;
  73. }

  75. /* Parse the ld.conf file and add the directories
  76.    listed there to the search path */

  78. ‌#define LD_CONF_NAME T("ld.conf")

  80. ‌CAMLexport char_os * caml_get_stdlib_location(void)
  81. {
  82.   char_os * stdlib;
  83.   stdlib = caml_secure_getenv(T("OCAMLLIB"));
  84.   if (stdlib == NULL) stdlib = caml_secure_getenv(T("CAMLLIB"));
  85.   if (stdlib == NULL) stdlib = OCAML_STDLIB_DIR;
  86.   return stdlib;
  87. }

  89. ‌CAMLexport char_os * caml_parse_ld_conf(void)
  90. {
  91.   char_os * stdlib, * ldconfname, * wconfig, * p, * q;
  92.   char * config;
  93. #ifdef _WIN32
  94.   struct _stati64 st;
  95. #else
  96.   struct stat st;
  97. #endif
  98.   int ldconf, nread;

  100.   stdlib = caml_get_stdlib_location();
  101.   ldconfname = caml_stat_strconcat_os(3, stdlib, T("/"), LD_CONF_NAME);
  102.   if (stat_os(ldconfname, &st) == -1) {
  103.     caml_stat_free(ldconfname);
  104.     return NULL;
  105.   }
  106.   ldconf = open_os(ldconfname, O_RDONLY, 0);
  107.   if (ldconf == -1)
  108.     caml_fatal_error("cannot read loader config file %s",
  109.                          caml_stat_strdup_of_os(ldconfname));
  110.   config = caml_stat_alloc(st.st_size + 1);
  111.   nread = read(ldconf, config, st.st_size);
  112.   if (nread == -1)
  113.     caml_fatal_error
  114.       ("error while reading loader config file %s",
  115.        caml_stat_strdup_of_os(ldconfname));
  116.   config[nread] = 0;
  117.   wconfig = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(config);
  118.   caml_stat_free(config);
  119.   q = wconfig;
  120.   for (p = wconfig; *p != 0; p++) {
  121.     if (*p == '\n') {
  122.       *p = 0;
  123.       caml_ext_table_add(&caml_shared_libs_path, q);
  124.       q = p + 1;
  125.     }
  126.   }
  127.   if (q < p) caml_ext_table_add(&caml_shared_libs_path, q);
  128.   close(ldconf);
  129.   caml_stat_free(ldconfname);
  130.   return wconfig;
  131. }

  133. /* Open the given shared library and add it to shared_libs.
  134.    Abort on error. */
  135. ‌static void open_shared_lib(char_os * name)
  136. {
  137.   char_os * realname;
  138.   char * u8;
  139.   void * handle;

  141.   realname = caml_search_dll_in_path(&caml_shared_libs_path, name);
  142.   u8 = caml_stat_strdup_of_os(realname);
  143.   caml_gc_message(0x100, "Loading shared library %s\n", u8);
  144.   caml_stat_free(u8);
  145.   caml_enter_blocking_section();
  146.   handle = caml_dlopen(realname, 1);
  147.   caml_leave_blocking_section();
  148.   if (handle == NULL)
  149.     caml_fatal_error
  150.     (
  151.       "cannot load shared library %s\n"
  152.       "Reason: %s",
  153.       caml_stat_strdup_of_os(name),
  154.       caml_dlerror()
  155.     );
  156.   caml_ext_table_add(&shared_libs, handle);
  157.   caml_stat_free(realname);
  158. }

  160. /* Build the table of primitives, given a search path and a list
  161.    of shared libraries (both 0-separated in a char array).
  162.    Abort the runtime system on error. */
  163. ‌void caml_build_primitive_table(char_os * lib_path,
  164.                                 char_os * libs,
  165.                                 char * req_prims)
  166. {
  167.   char_os * tofree1, * tofree2;
  168.   char_os * p;
  169.   char * q;

  171.   /* Initialize the search path for dynamic libraries:
  172.      - directories specified on the command line with the -I option
  173.      - directories specified in the CAML_LD_LIBRARY_PATH
  174.      - directories specified in the executable
  175.      - directories specified in the file <stdlib>/ld.conf */
  176.   tofree1 = caml_decompose_path(&caml_shared_libs_path,
  177.                                 caml_secure_getenv(T("CAML_LD_LIBRARY_PATH")));
  178.   if (lib_path != NULL)
  179.     for (p = lib_path; *p != 0; p += strlen_os(p) + 1)
  180.       caml_ext_table_add(&caml_shared_libs_path, p);
  181.   tofree2 = caml_parse_ld_conf();
  182.   /* Open the shared libraries */
  183.   caml_ext_table_init(&shared_libs, 8);
  184.   if (libs != NULL)
  185.     for (p = libs; *p != 0; p += strlen_os(p) + 1)
  186.       open_shared_lib(p);
  187.   /* Build the primitive table */
  188.   caml_ext_table_init(&caml_prim_table, 0x180);
  189. #ifdef DEBUG
  190.   caml_ext_table_init(&caml_prim_name_table, 0x180);
  191. #endif
  192.   for (q = req_prims; *q != 0; q += strlen(q) + 1) {
  193.     c_primitive prim = lookup_primitive(q);
  194.     if (prim == NULL)
  195.           caml_fatal_error("unknown C primitive `%s'", q);
  196.     caml_ext_table_add(&caml_prim_table, (void *) prim);
  197. #ifdef DEBUG
  198.     caml_ext_table_add(&caml_prim_name_table, caml_stat_strdup(q));
  199. #endif
  200.   }
  201.   /* Clean up */
  202.   caml_stat_free(tofree1);
  203.   caml_stat_free(tofree2);
  204.   caml_ext_table_free(&caml_shared_libs_path, 0);
  205. }

  207. /* Build the table of primitives as a copy of the builtin primitive table.
  208.    Used for executables generated by ocamlc -output-obj. */

  210. ‌void caml_build_primitive_table_builtin(void)
  211. {
  212.   int i;
  213.   caml_ext_table_init(&caml_prim_table, 0x180);
  214. #ifdef DEBUG
  215.   caml_ext_table_init(&caml_prim_name_table, 0x180);
  216. #endif
  217.   for (i = 0; caml_builtin_cprim[i] != 0; i++) {
  218.     caml_ext_table_add(&caml_prim_table, (void *) caml_builtin_cprim[i]);
  219. #ifdef DEBUG
  220.     caml_ext_table_add(&caml_prim_name_table,
  221.                        caml_stat_strdup(caml_names_of_builtin_cprim[i]));
  222. #endif
  223.   }
  224. }

  226. ‌void caml_free_shared_libs(void)
  227. {
  228.   while (shared_libs.size > 0)
  229.     caml_dlclose(shared_libs.contents[--shared_libs.size]);
  230. }

  232. #endif /* NATIVE_CODE */

  234. /** dlopen interface for the bytecode linker **/

  236. ‌#define Handle_val(v) (*((void **) (v)))

  238. ‌CAMLprim value caml_dynlink_open_lib(value filename)
  239. {
  240.   void * handle;
  241.   value result;
  242.   char_os * p;

  244.   caml_gc_message(0x100, "Opening shared library %s\n",
  245.                   String_val(filename));
  246.   p = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(filename));
  247.   caml_enter_blocking_section();
  248.   handle = caml_dlopen(p, 1);
  249.   caml_leave_blocking_section();
  250.   caml_stat_free(p);
  251.   if (handle == NULL) caml_failwith(caml_dlerror());
  252.   result = caml_alloc_small(1, Abstract_tag);
  253.   Handle_val(result) = handle;
  254.   return result;
  255. }

  257. ‌CAMLprim value caml_dynlink_close_lib(value handle)
  258. {
  259.   caml_dlclose(Handle_val(handle));
  260.   return Val_unit;
  261. }

  263. /*#include <stdio.h>*/
  264. ‌CAMLprim value caml_dynlink_lookup_symbol(value handle, value symbolname)
  265. {
  266.   void * symb;
  267.   value result;
  268.   symb = caml_dlsym(Handle_val(handle), String_val(symbolname));
  269.   /* printf("%s = 0x%lx\n", String_val(symbolname), symb);
  270.      fflush(stdout); */
  271.   if (symb == NULL) return Val_unit /*caml_failwith(caml_dlerror())*/;
  272.   result = caml_alloc_small(1, Abstract_tag);
  273.   Handle_val(result) = symb;
  274.   return result;
  275. }

  277. #ifndef NATIVE_CODE

  279. ‌CAMLprim value caml_dynlink_add_primitive(value handle)
  280. {
  281.   return Val_int(caml_ext_table_add(&caml_prim_table, Handle_val(handle)));
  282. }

  284. ‌CAMLprim value caml_dynlink_get_current_libs(value unit)
  285. {
  286.   CAMLparam0();
  287.   CAMLlocal1(res);
  288.   int i;

  290.   res = caml_alloc_tuple(shared_libs.size);
  291.   for (i = 0; i < shared_libs.size; i++) {
  292.     value v = caml_alloc_small(1, Abstract_tag);
  293.     Handle_val(v) = shared_libs.contents[i];
  294.     Store_field(res, i, v);
  295.   }
  296.   CAMLreturn(res);
  297. }

  299. #else

  301. ‌value caml_dynlink_add_primitive(value handle)
  302. {
  303.   caml_invalid_argument("dynlink_add_primitive");
  304.   return Val_unit; /* not reached */
  305. }

  307. ‌value caml_dynlink_get_current_libs(value unit)
  308. {
  309.   caml_invalid_argument("dynlink_get_current_libs");
  310.   return Val_unit; /* not reached */
  311. }

  313. #endif /* NATIVE_CODE */
